channel.title: Commands and npc HITS
channel.description:
Hi again and again, again. :P
First thing first. My NPC's have awsome hits!! I don't want them too.. :( How do i change this?
2. How do i make a command that is just for admins? The kind of command I am looking for is the one that levels up all your skills to 99!
I would be really happy if someone could help me with this.
Thanks all!
Pkn000000b

item.title: Commands and npc HITS
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) // By I James I { addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); addSkillXP(14910000, 3); addSkillXP(14910000, 4); addSkillXP(14910000, 5); addSkillXP(14910000, 6); addSkillXP(14910000, 7); addSkillXP(14910000, 8); addSkillXP(14910000, 9); addSkillXP(14910000, 10); addSkillXP(14910000, 11); addSkillXP(14910000, 12); addSkillXP(14910000, 13); addSkillXP(14910000, 14); addSkillXP(14910000, 15); addSkillXP(14910000, 16); addSkillXP(14910000, 17); addSkillXP(14910000, 18); addSkillXP(14910000, 19); addSkillXP(14910000, 20); addSkillXP(14910000, 21); addSkillXP(14910000, 22); addSkillXP(14910000, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. you're max levels!"); }

Edit npc’s max hit’s in npchandler.java.
